title: Adjust Runepages like u can masteries(in champ select)
body:
In champ select it would be nice to adjust my runes i have 3 rune pages, one for AD, one for Tank, and one for AP.
sometimes i go against ap supports, sometimes Ap tops, Ad tops, AP mids, and AD mid. I really want to be able to change them so i can adjust them, on my AD rune page i usually ues for zed mid, lets say i got against a ziggs, or an orianna, i would be able to put on magic resist, or lets say yasuo, so i could put on armour runes,

                        Thanks

replies.body: they charge you IP/RP for additional rune pages.  if you could have any rune set you wanted with just 2 pages by modifying before the game it would completely invalidate the reason for buying a new page.
You might now be able to buy a new rune page, but you would still need to buy all the runes themselves.  They could just make the runes cost more and it would equal out.

> [{quoted}](name=Triple0seven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5IsNlvR9,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-24T17:58:50.289+0000)
>
> You might now be able to buy a new rune page, but you would still need to buy all the runes themselves.  They could just make the runes cost more and it would equal out.

Implying that the prices aren't already expensive as hell.

I finally completed all my seven rune pages and it took me almost 50k IP. (Stupid health and CDR runes cost absurdly high)

I really don't want to see them increase rune prices ever.

That's not necessarily true, same way that having up to 20 mastery pages is still a thing even though you can adjust them all you want during champ select. It's still nice to already have a few general pages set up just-in-case without having to redo the whole page every time.

As has been mentioned already, the reason you can't do this is because Riot wants you to have to buy extra rune pages.  Since they are so costly (6300 IP), they tempt people to buy rune pages with RP when they put out their "2 for 1" rune page "deals."  I agree that you should be able to adjust them, but this **IS** one of the areas where Riot makes it hard for you so that they can make money.

> [{quoted}](name=PatMcGroyn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5IsNlvR9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-24T21:13:53.294+0000)

Since they are so costly (6300 IP), they tempt people to buy rune pages with RP when they put out their "2 for 1" rune page "deals."  I agree that you should be able to adjust them, but this **IS** one of the areas where Riot makes it hard for you so that they can make money.

Speaking of which riot has totally lied in saying there would be one more before the end of this year.
Supposedly held back to January. But I can still get the deal with ip right?
I'd be happy if they just let us reorder the damn pages.  It is almost 2015 and we still can't change the order of our rune or mastery pages.
I agree, dragging and dropping to reorder would be nice. A lot of foresight went into my runes/masteries ordering for this very reason.
I don't see why it would honestly... Lots of OCD going on here.
They charge you for additional rune pages. If they enabled this, you wouldn't need to buy rune pages.

I'd say you probably would-- if only because the interface can be a bit buggy sometimes. I have issues quickly changing runes because some of my clicks just don't register; this could lead to incomplete pages when the timer runs out.
True. But I wouldn't see you needing more than 4 or 5. That way you wouldn't need to edit them EVERY champ select.

discourages rune page purchases
you'd think they would have let you have as many rune pages as you want and adjust them in champ select since you shell out so many points for them, and have sold additional mastery pages while not letting you change those pages instead since you get all the mastery points for free but rito likes to minimize the fun of runes and never do anything useful about them
